transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Haa sir aap boliye.
Executive: Haa ji ji.
Customer: Kamlesh ji main aapke last time aapki manager se baat hui thi na jab.
Executive: Haa.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To buylead aap consume kar hi rahe hain.
Customer: Buy lead haa kaise consume kar raha hai.
Executive: Kaise consume kar rahe hain.
Customer: Koi response nahi aa raha.
Executive: Basically aapka company ka teesra mahina chal raha hai ek bhi boni nahi hua hai batate rahe hain IndiaMART isi bar ka fees le lijiye le liye ab iske baad kabhi jeevan mein IndiaMART mein hum log register nahi karaye wo chalega isi bar abhi teen mahina ho gaya ek bhi aapka hai consumer hai phone nahi receive kar rahe hain to ye nahi kar rahe khali aarop lagate hain kisko shauk hai ki matlab paisa laga ke aur phone na uthaye aur matlab customer ko nahi de rahe aapko aapko Kamlesh ji ek cheez bata du maine aapse last time bhi pichle mahine baat kari thi na bahut lambi baat hui thi hamari is bare mein.
Customer: Haa.
Executive: To last time jab apni baat hui thi maine aapko ek cheez batai thi ki jab hum IndiaMART ke bahar ke naam se call aate hain.
Customer: Yes sir aise aana ki paisa laga ke to sikhiye gaye aur humko lagane ka man nahi hai baki aapka IndiaMART aapko mubarak ho hum to bole the kal ki parso call kar ₹15000 le liye aur TrustSeal aur kya kya jo scheme hai de diye to wo bhi nahi diye.
Executive: Kamlesh ji pehli baat to pehli baat TrustSeal ke liye nahi hai pehli baat se hamara kaam hai to guide karna service dena service provide karana jo aapko service chali hui hai TrustSeal to baad ki baat hai wo to apni ek advantage hai ki agar client ka man karta hai ya aapka jo hai man karega to TrustSeal ki taraf ko hum chalenge but pehle to.
Customer: Mera kehna hai ki hum as a broker nahi hai manufacturer hai to mera kehna hai manufacturer hai aur humko lagta hai ki usse jyada kya kehte hain ki humse jyada facility koi de nahi raha rate bhi compromise kiya hua hai sab kuch kiya hua hai uske bavajud bhi samne nahi mil raha to kya karega aadmi.
Executive: Kamlesh ji maine aapko sirf sirf do hi teen cheez aap mujhe bataiye Kamlesh ji aapse meri kitne lambe samay se baat ho rahi hai is cheez ke bare mein business ke bare mein ya apni company ke bare mein ho hi raha hai to haa kya kare hum to hum phone karna chhod diye ab aap man lijiye ek din baat kijiyega uske baad fir apna fir kabhi avashyakta padega koi scheme woskim aaya hoga tab phone kijiyega to kya karenge isliye hum log ne sanata marne ke liye ab dekhiye aapka aapka aisa to hai nahi Kamlesh ji ki main aapke account handle nahi kar raha hu ya service provide nahi karwa raha hu jitna mere se matlab ho pa raha hai apni side se main utna apni puri koshish kar raha hu aap mujhe ek cheez bataiye apna phone aayega Kolkata se chaliye mere bhai phone aayega Kolkata se Jharkhand ki company hai aur mere bagal ka phone aayega Kolkata se aur wo bhi Polpatia ka koyla ka rehta to ek baat rehta to yahi sab hai aayega phone kya hai to pata chalega ki wo aa raha Muzaffarpur se kyu ki wo Bihar Jharkhand mein hai lekin hum log kya hai na ki aisa nahi do teen company bana ke rakhe hue hum log provide kar sakte hain lekin sawal kya hai na ki wo bolta hai ki aapka Jharkhand ka profile hai aur aap hai to hum bole to aap kyu phone kiye Bihar ka dekh ke kya.
Executive: Achha achha achha.
Customer: Dusra cheez hai aapka consumer consumer aapka achha nahi hai koi achha nahi hai wo lakh usse achha just dial aapko mane ya na mane aapka ek haa theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye Kamlesh ji aap meri ek chhoti si baat suniye jaise ki main aap buylead consume kar rahe ho ji aap IndiaMART se aap mujhe keh rahe ho ki sab jo bhi buylead consume kar raha hu.
Customer: Sab kharab hai consume karte hain hum jante hain sab third class hai theek hai consume kya kar rahe ho mera paisa laga hua shanivar ko jitna bachta hai sab ko jhuthe sachhe consume karke call bhi nahi utha raha hai.
Executive: Bilkul bilkul bilkul bilkul.
Customer: Ab meri ek jaise maine last time aapse baat ki thi to maine aapko ek cheez ke bare mein bataya tha pehli cheez to ye ki aap keh rahe the ki mera number change karna aap.
Executive: Kya change karna hai.
Customer: Jiske buyer ki call aati hai jo samne se IndiaMART buyer ke naam se usme se aap ek bhi call receive nahi karte hain pichle mahine ki 13 call failed hai ek bhi call aap receive nahi karte ho.
Executive: 13 call aaj dekhiye naye mahine mein aaj do tarikh hai na kal ya parso phone aaya tha sab ka receive ho raha hai aapko isi ka dikkat nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Kal aaya tha Kolkata Kolkata se aaya tha.
Customer: Wo bolta hai ki yahan se 300 kilometer dur ka Polpatia ka hai to bhane lag jayega to kya aayega.
Executive: Ab dekhiye.
Customer: Paisa to call nahi aayega.
Executive: Ek cheez bata raha hu aaj main aapka jo aap bol rahe ho call aaya tha November mein isme dikh raha hai system mein aap bol rahe the na pichli bar ki aap aise bol dete ho jaise aapne bataya ki November mein call aaya tha wo mere paas dikh raha hai performance report mein aur dusri cheez ye October mein jo 13 call miss hue hain wo bhi dikh rahe hain isme aur jo aap aap ye bol rahe ho ki jo buylead mein consume kar raha hu wo sab mere liye waste hai to abhi jo aa raha hai na abhi jo aa raha hai usko hum log receive kar rahe hain mere phone mein pata nahi kya hai nahi hai lekin mera kehna nahi hai aapke paas customer sun liya ab aage boliye aapko karna kya hai ye bataiye customer aapka nahi hai wo market mein nahi hai IndiaMART mein utna apne se consume kariye aur jhut mut ka time waste kariye wo nahi hai aapka flop hai hum bol diye na hum log bhi 20 saal se business kar rahe hain hum log samajhte hain koi baat nahi hai mahine ka fees mein aap pura item aap nichod dijiyega last mahina hoga na to ye aap log aayiyega boliyega ye kar rahe hain denge wo kar denge aise boliyega kabhi aap naye naye hue hain to naye naye ho gaye to teen mahina hai purana ho gaya na ek bhi to kar do kya.
Executive: Ji ek cheez mujhe ek cheez bhi bataiye sir aapse main chhoti si baat puchh raha hu aaj tak aisa kam hua hai ki main aapko cheez service guiding karne ke liye aaj tak main piche hata hu ya maine kabhi aapko kuch cheez provide nahi karwai ho ya kya hua ho is cheez ke liye to aapko har bar guide karta hu us tarike se ek ek call ke liye par aap hamesha negative leke chalte hain negative baatein karte hain hoga comparison karne lagte hain agar aap proper tarike se apne sath agar aap work karoge aap jaise bol rahe the ki jo IndiaMART ke buyer ka number aata hai aapke phone number pe aata hai par wo hai ki 20 mein Indian call failed thi India ki jab 3000 4000 customer call karega aadmi interested hota hai aise kisi ko thodi ko na call karenge aap agar interested hai kisi se aap call karenge kisi ko aapko 15 call aa rahi hai 15 15 call nahi nahi hum to Delhi mein bhi rahega na to usko bhi aap call aayega to usko bhi hum provide kara denge hum to jo rate usko waha milta hai usi rate mein hum yaha se bhijwa denge mere paas wo bhi sadhan hai kaha sala mil raha hai suno.
Executive: Kamlesh ji mujhe aap ek chhoti si cheez bataiye man lijiye aap kis kisko call karenge jab aapko kuch saman ki need hogi jarurat hogi jinhe aap call karenge aise samne se 15 log aapko call kar rahe hain usme se mushkil se mushkil agar main man lu panch panch minute bhi aise honge ki ha bilkul final karne ki stage honge agar hum call receive nahi karenge to aap sir apne upar mahina suniye na hello hello haa ji bataiye haa bole ek tarikh se dekhiye na miss call aaya miss hua hai pehle dekhiye to kya nahi koi maine dekha hai aapka miss nahi hua hai wo call aapne receive kiya hai.
Customer: Aap kiya hai na hum bhi dekh hi rahe mahina na theek hai haa is call wo call aapne Kamlesh ji receive kiya hai par main aapko ek chhoti main abhi kabhi Kamlesh ji main ek cheez bata deta hu aapko aap buylead jo consume kar rahe ho na wo aap daily basis pe kar rahe ho wo bahut achchi baat hai aap daily basis pe buylead consume kar rahe ho but aap daily basis pe phone uthana shuru kar doge na aur jo inquiries aati hain unka bhi reply karna shuru kar doge to ek sath bahut bada ye positive impact padta hai cheezon pe aap ek chhoti si cheez bataiye call kaun aadmi karega call wahi to aadmi karega jo bilkul interested hoga lene ke liye stage pe khada hoga wahi call karega aapko agar usi aadmi ka 15 call ka jawab nahi dete hain hum 15 mein se panch aadmi aise honge jo bilkul final stage pe hain jo bas dhundhte hain ki kaun sa schedule de mujhe kaun kaun sa supplier schedule de us hisab se wo kar dete hain convert boss mera client base aisa hai Kamlesh ji aapko bata du pehli baat to main connect rehta hu sabse aapse ye bataiye na ek mahine char panch bar che bar sat bar baat kar leta hu kam se kam is chakkar mein to karta hu main aapka account check karta rehta hu dekhta rehta hu kya kya dikkat hai kya isme karna chahiye aur kya nahi kar rahe ho aap aapko batata hu main aapko main to apne side se main to apne side se Kamlesh ji apne pure efforts deta hu dekhiye aur IndiaMART ki side se aapko pure efforts milte rahe jitne matlab ek client base ko milne chahiye bas wo hai ki thoda sa Kamlesh ji thoda sa bataiye main batata hu kya hai aap ek to call uthaiye bilkul call uthane se ek activity active ness se kya hoga Kamlesh ji agar aap aap active rahenge platform pe barabar aapki call kuch inquiries increase hogi call jante hain ek number aur hai mere sister ka hai wo uthate hain na unke paas to wo to gadi dho dho ke uthate hain unke paas call ki haa to usme thoda sa aapko ye kehna hai Kamlesh ji aur mujhe aap ye bataiye chalo aap agar barabar platform pe active hai ab ye main dekh raha hu aap buylead consume kar rahe hain barabar aisa to buylead mein kisi ko koi conversion nahi hai koi matlab koi conversion nahi aa raha buylead mein kya koi are kyu jhoot bolenge mera kehna jhoot bolne se humko koi fayda hai nahi nahi jhoot jhoot bolne ka koi fayda nahi kyuki aap mere se jhoot bolenge dekhiye usse dekho humko cement ka jarurat tha usko dobara hum usko cement karwa diye usko fayda hai na IndiaMART ke dekhiye kya hai usme aapka AS company limited usko puchiye IndiaMART ke usko sale ka fayda ho raha hai mere se cement usko order karaya aur uske baad ek aage sun lijiye paisa kar hum bolne ki tarah IndiaMART mein hum complaint kar rahe hain ghabrao mat wo fir haa aapne IndiaMART mein complaint dal rakhi hai aapko call gaya maine aapne ye dal rakha hai hum fir aapne Kamlesh ji Kamlesh ji meri chhoti si baat suniye aap agar main yaha pe aapko add karne ke liye aapko sab kuch account bhi handle karne ke liye yaha pe baitha hua hu sab cheez aapko proper tarike se main call bata deta hu ki ye koi aapke sath matlab ki aapke advantages ke liye ki aap bhi business milna chahiye hamari jo company hai usko uske liye main apne pure efforts dal raha hu aap ye mere mere mere liye aap ye negative dal rahe hain India very bad experience experience to hai hi na bad kya galat dal diye kya ho gaya teen mahina se ek bhi milega sir phone ek hai bolta hai ki TrustSeal kara lo hum bole ghar bech ke aur late hain paisa isliye baat aadmi ka paisa laga hua mahina bhar ka saal bhar ka aur saal mein ek bhi nahi mila ki ha aadmi ko 25000 khala aur uske baad ye karke ye karke wo kar diye to kya karega bilkul bilkul Kamlesh ji main dekhiye hamara kaam hai mera kaam jo hai aapko guide karna hai decision making ka kaam aapka hai maine last time bhi bataya tha ki decision making ka kaam hota hai client ka agar aap kya bole paisa nahi na hum log business chala rahe hain na sir please humko thoda sa samay de hum sham ko baat karte hain theek hai sir ek kam kariye Kamlesh ji ek kam kariye ek chota sa kam kar dijiye boliye ye aapki jo problem hai sari main aapko ek kam karu whatsapp pe sab main share karta raha karu aapko buylead ya call ki jo haa kariye na theek hai aur ek kam ye ticket open hua hai na aap ek agar main ye close kar du ticket aapka na na close nahi kijiyega ticket hum baat karenge kis kis
summary:
Concerns:

- Not getting any response from buyleads.

- No sales even after 3 months.

- Alleging that IndiaMART is making false accusations.

- Not receiving benefits of TrustSeal.

- Calls from irrelevant locations.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the purpose of TrustSeal.

- Executive mentioned customer missed 13 calls last month.

- Executive assured to share updates on WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, trustseal, complaints, calls
